name: Rebellion of Levare (eelsage)
description:
The continent of Sibiril. A land ruled for a thousand years by kings and torn apart for a thousand years by wars. Its people toil in fields for their masters and die for faceless monarchs untold miles from their homes....

Command Katja and her ragtag group of insurgents as they fight to destroy the oppressive monarchy of their homeland, Levare. Rebellion of Levare is a Fire Emblem fangame created from July-September 2020.

The gameplay closely mirrors that of Fire Emblem: Sacred Stones, with a series of chapters to complete as you progress through the story. RoL features 6 chapters, 3 recruitable ally characters (8 total), and plenty of bootlickers to defeat in combat.

For more info, including a list of known issues, see: https://eelchamber.neocities.org/levare.html
